transArray.content: Parking is very convenient and the breakfast service is very good.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for your recognition of the hotel's environment and services. Your satisfaction is the driving force for our progress. The hotel is located in the Badali Automobile Park on the Fourth Ring Road. It shares parking spaces with the park. There are sufficient parking spaces and is close to You can park for free just by picking up the electronic parking coupon at the front desk. The hotel is surrounded by public transportation, making it your best choice for business trips and accommodations. Thank you very much for your recognition of the breakfast in the hotel. Stay well and eat well. feel like home. All hotel staff look forward to your every visit and wish you success in your work! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
